title: Contact RivianTrackr
text:
Skip to content
Got a question, feedback, or a partnership idea? We’d love to hear from you. RivianTrackr exists because of the community around it, from long time Rivian owners to EV curious newcomers and brands building cool things in the space.
Whether you’re reaching out with a quick question, a tip, or an idea to collaborate, you’re always welcome here.
General inquiriesHave a question, comment, or something you think we should cover? Send us a message and we’ll get back to you as soon as we can.
Press and mediaLooking for insights, commentary, or quotes related to Rivian, EVs, or the broader electric vehicle landscape? Happy to help.
Partnerships and collaborationsIf you’re a brand, creator, or company interested in working together, reach out and let’s start a conversation.
Contact information
Email[email protected]
We do our best to respond to all messages within 48 hours. Thanks for taking the time to reach out, we genuinely appreciate it.
